page.title: 16Housing/Buildings
page.content: Residential area. Large detached houses on the "Cliff". Semi-detached and terraced houses in the main village running parallel with the seashore. Modern bungalows in two estsates on the northern end of the village - Glan-yr ystrad and Glanmorfa.There is one council estate -some privately owned houses. Most of the houses in the village are privately owned. Older houses are stone and brick built.Modern bungalows are built from concrete block. Roofing material is mainly slate.Modern houses have tiled roofs.
